title: Doctor Have You Got a Minute
creator: Digi-Media-Apps

extendedInfo.description: TomÂ SmithÂ isÂ theÂ doctorÂ youÂ wishÂ youÂ hadÂ andÂ he'sÂ gotÂ allÂ theÂ timeÂ inÂ theÂ world...YouÂ mightÂ makeÂ anÂ appointmentÂ withÂ yourÂ GPÂ toÂ enquireÂ aboutÂ aÂ persistentÂ coughÂ orÂ aÂ septicÂ toe.Â ButÂ whenÂ doÂ youÂ getÂ toÂ askÂ theÂ questionsÂ thatÂ youÂ reallyÂ wantÂ theÂ answersÂ to?Â AllÂ thoseÂ healthÂ mysteriesÂ -Â someÂ trivial,Â someÂ serious,Â someÂ downrightÂ weirdÂ -Â theyÂ areÂ theÂ onesÂ thatÂ reallyÂ matter,Â theÂ nigglingÂ worriesÂ whichÂ keepÂ youÂ upÂ atÂ night...WillÂ IÂ ageÂ atÂ theÂ sameÂ rateÂ asÂ myÂ mother?Â CouldÂ myÂ birthmarkÂ beÂ cancerous?Â WhyÂ doÂ womenÂ startÂ growingÂ hairÂ onÂ theirÂ chinsÂ atÂ 35?Â IsÂ aÂ man'sÂ handÂ sizeÂ reallyÂ aÂ signÂ ofÂ theÂ lengthÂ ofÂ hisÂ penis?Â ThisÂ isÂ yourÂ chanceÂ toÂ cornerÂ aÂ doctorÂ atÂ aÂ partyÂ andÂ boldlyÂ goÂ whereÂ noÂ patientÂ hasÂ goneÂ before...DrÂ TomÂ Smith,Â gentlyÂ urbaneÂ andÂ seeminglyÂ unshockable,Â answersÂ yourÂ questionsÂ withÂ aÂ witÂ andÂ wisdomÂ thatÂ sadlyÂ yourÂ ownÂ doctorÂ justÂ neverÂ seemsÂ toÂ haveÂ timeÂ for.Please Note that the book is stored on your phone and you do NOT need a data connection to read it.This is a full-length, quality digitized book.Doctor Have You Got a Minute, by Tom Smith, is packaged with an easy to use functional book reader which means you can down load the App and start reading.This is a full length ebook version of this title. Further details of distribution rights and copyright ownership  are available at www.digimediaapps.com/license.aspx*******   Features include    ********** - Horizontal or vertical Scroll up/down - Opens up where you left off reading - Variable font size / color - Portrait and Landscape mode - Table of Contents for easy navigation between chapters - Set bookmarks to remember marked sections
